name: stench
short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

flavor_text.sun_moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
